quiz.question: Which two rival brands are known for their athletic sneakers and celebrity endorsements?
Which company acquired Pixar in 2006, strengthening its animation and studio rivalry?
Which electric vehicle entry targeted by traditional automakers used which battery innovation early on?
options: Lithium-ion cells widely used by Tesla
quiz.answer: Lithium-ion cells widely used by Tesla
